info: Oversees all academic programs, curriculum development, examination policies, and student academic progress across all faculties.
Handles undergraduate and postgraduate admissions, entrance exam coordination, and application processing for all programs.
Maintains student records, issues transcripts and certificates, handles course registration, and manages academic documentation.
Provides financial assistance through scholarships, fee waivers, education loans, and merit-based awards for deserving students.
Offers comprehensive student support including counseling, disability services, hostel accommodation, and student life activities.
Facilitates job placements, internships, industry partnerships, career counseling, and professional development programs.
Manages study abroad programs, international student services, university partnerships, and global academic collaborations.
Promotes research activities, manages funded projects, facilitates faculty-student research collaboration, and innovation initiatives.
Provides comprehensive library resources, digital databases, study spaces, research support, and information literacy programs.
Maintains campus IT infrastructure, student portals, Wi-Fi services, computer labs, and provides technical support to users.
Ensures campus safety, manages parking services, emergency response, visitor management, and security protocols.
Manages sports facilities, organizes tournaments, fitness programs, recreational activities, and promotes student wellness.
Provides healthcare services, emergency medical care, health checkups, and maintains student health records.
Handles fee collection, financial planning, budget management, salary processing, and all financial transactions.
Coordinates student clubs, cultural events, festivals, competitions, and extracurricular activities across campus.
Maintains alumni network, organizes reunions, facilitates alumni mentorship programs, and manages alumni contributions.
Maintains campus infrastructure, hostel facilities, classroom management, utilities, and campus development projects.
Prevents ragging incidents, investigates complaints, implements anti-ragging policies, and ensures student safety and dignity.
